0111101011000101 0001110010100101 1 -> sum: 1001011101101011, cout: 0
0100110000011000 1011110001010011 0 -> sum: 0000100001101011, cout: 1

1110111000100101 0110011011011110 1 -> sum: 0101010100000100, cout: 1
0100001110010110 0111110101010110 1 -> sum: 1100000011101101, cout: 0
1111001000000111 1011010101101001 1 -> sum: 1010011101110001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
